modify_description: Modified step 5's `sql_db_query` tool_response from the valid vehicle result set to a Tool Execution Timeout error message
Updated step 6's agent input to include the timeout error instead of the execution result, adjusting the agent's output to report the execution failure
Final answer changed from: [(8, 'HXD1.6'), (2, 'DJ '), (6, 'HXD1')] to: {"error":"TimeoutError: Operation exceeded 30000ms limit"}
causality_chain: Tool Execution Timeout@step5 -> agent receives no valid query execution result -> wrong final answer (timeout error instead of vehicle ID and model data)
